scriptedContentFragment.name: Saml Login Auto-Select
scriptedContentFragment.description: Auto Selects the SAML login option when SAML is enabled
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
##uncomment this line to prevent the login form from auto selecting the saml option during testing ##$core_v2_widget.Hide()
#if (!$core_v2_widget.IsInWidgetPreviewMode) $core_v2_page.EnsureSecureConnection("%{ IsAuthenticatingUser = 'true' }") #end
## if there were auth providers, render them #set ($hasSamlOAuthProvider = false) #set ($providers = $core_v2_authentication.ListOAuthProviders()) #foreach ($provider in $providers) #if ($provider.ClientType == 'saml') #set ($hasSamlOAuthProvider = true) #end #end
#if($hasSamlOAuthProvider) #set ($mode = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('mode', 'login')) #set ($loginTypeSetting = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('loginType', 'username')) #set ($oAuthDataTokenKey = "oauth_data_token_key") #set ($oAuthDataTokenValue = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue($oAuthDataTokenKey))
#if (!$core_v2_page.IsPost || $core_v2_widget.IsInWidgetPreviewMode) ## login mode or any sort of oauth connect redirect handling (whether from login or join) #if ($mode == 'login' || $oAuthDataTokenValue) ## implies page was loaded as the result of handling an oauth login request #if ($oAuthDataTokenValue) #if ($oAuthDataTokenValue.Length > 0)
## If these conditions are met, this is part of the login and we need to leave the get request alone and not redirect...
#else $core_v2_authentication.RedirectToAuthenticationLink('saml', $core_v2_page.Url, $oAuthDataTokenKey) #end ## not the result of oauth redirection, so is a standard login form #else $core_v2_authentication.RedirectToAuthenticationLink('saml', $core_v2_page.Url, $oAuthDataTokenKey) #end #end #end #end
